name: Hell's Dungeon
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2018/2019).

Developed by:

  • Vasco Santos
  • José Lico

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D - Movement
  • 1, 2, 3 - Select combat type
  • P - Dash (must be moving)
  • L - Attack

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
